Mat¶

Module Mat¶

This is the Mat module

Host of useful manipulation methods for:

Furgo Metocean Consultancy - Americas
class aid.Mat[source]¶

Class to facilitate matlab operations for FUGRO Softwares

  • fmdm_meta()

  • save()

Methods¶

aid.Mat.fmdm_meta(lat=0, lon=0, waterdepth=0, Contract='Contract')¶

Create a dictionary with metadata necessary for FMDM.

Parameters

  • lat (float) – Latitude

  • lon (float) – Longitude

  • waterdepth (float) – waterdepth

  • Contract (str) – Contract

Returns

dict Data corresponding to metadata

aid.Mat.save(fname, mdict)¶

Save a dictionary of names and arrays into a MATLAB-style .mat file.

Parameters

  • fname (str) – Name of the .mat file

  • mdict (dict) – Dictionary from which to save matfile variables
